## Tips / 提示
Please read [How To Ask Questions The Smart Way](http://www.catb.org/~esr/faqs/smart-questions.html) first before submit issues.  
在提问或提交bug前，请仔细阅读[提问的智慧](https://github.com/ryanhanwu/How-To-Ask-Questions-The-Smart-Way/blob/main/README-zh_CN.md)。

## Is your feature request related to a problem? / 您的建议是否与某个问题相关？

Please describe the problem clearly. Ex: I'm always frustrated when [...]  
请清晰地描述该问题。例如：当 [...] 时，我总是感到很困扰。  

## Describe the solution you'd like / 您期望的解决方案

A clear and concise description of what you want to happen.  
请清晰简洁地描述您期望发生的事情。  

## Describe alternatives you've considered / 您考虑过的替代方案

A clear and concise description of any alternative solutions or features you've considered.  
请清晰简洁地描述您考虑过的任何替代解决方案或功能。  

## Additional context / 其他背景信息

Add any other context or screenshots about the feature request here.  
在此处添加关于该功能建议的其他背景信息或截图。
